title: RTX 5070 Ti listings appear on US and EU retailers, some at nearly double the MSRP
content: Several online retailers are now putting up listings for RTX 5070 Ti GPUs with prices ranging from $750 to almost double the MSRP.
contentSnippet: Several online retailers are now putting up listings for RTX 5070 Ti GPUs with prices ranging from $750 to almost double the MSRP.

title: Asus ROG Strix XG27ACDNG 360 Hz OLED gaming monitor review: Lighting-fast with pro-level color accuracy
content: Asus brings maximum performance and color accuracy to its ROG Strix XG27ACDNG. Sporting a 27-inch QHD 2560x1440 Quantum Dot OLED panel, it delivers quick response and smooth motion for gaming with an extremely large and accurate color gamut.
contentSnippet: Asus brings maximum performance and color accuracy to its ROG Strix XG27ACDNG. Sporting a 27-inch QHD 2560x1440 Quantum Dot OLED panel, it delivers quick response and smooth motion for gaming with an extremely large and accurate color gamut.

title: Montech Titan PLA 1000W PSU Review
content: Premium build, exceptional electrical performance, and top-tier reliability - Montech's Titan PLA 1000W delivers but at a price.
contentSnippet: Premium build, exceptional electrical performance, and top-tier reliability - Montech's Titan PLA 1000W delivers but at a price.

title: Western Digital to unveil 44TB HAMR HDDs in 2026, 100TB in 2030

title: New EU packaging regulations spark misplaced fear of CPUs ditching stock coolers
content: New EU regulations spark concerns about CPU packaging, foregoing CPU coolers entirely.
contentSnippet: New EU regulations spark concerns about CPU packaging, foregoing CPU coolers entirely.

title: An 'unfortunate incident' hits latest Ubuntu 24.04 point release
content: The Noble Numbat has been besieged with delays
contentSnippet: The Noble Numbat has been besieged with delays

title: Anti-Lag 2 removed from Spider-Man 2 PC port due to game crashes on Radeon GPUs
content: Spider-Man 2 developers temporarily removed Anti-Lag 2 from the game to stop the game from crashing on some Radeon GPUs. The latency-enhancing tech will be reintroduced once AMD fixes the issue with an upcoming driver update.
contentSnippet: Spider-Man 2 developers temporarily removed Anti-Lag 2 from the game to stop the game from crashing on some Radeon GPUs. The latency-enhancing tech will be reintroduced once AMD fixes the issue with an upcoming driver update.

title: AMD announces RX 9070 event on February 28, shoots down rumors of 32GB model
content: AMD says that it will not launch a 32GB version of the RX 9070 XT GPU, but that it will have an RX 9070 event on February 28. It sounds as though both the vanilla and XT cards will launch concurrently.
contentSnippet: AMD says that it will not launch a 32GB version of the RX 9070 XT GPU, but that it will have an RX 9070 event on February 28. It sounds as though both the vanilla and XT cards will launch concurrently.

title: Nvidia's RTX 5090 power cables may be doomed to burn
content: A rising tide of speculators are arguing that Nvidia's 16-pin 12VHPWR standard is designed with no safety factor, causing melting cables.
contentSnippet: A rising tide of speculators are arguing that Nvidia's 16-pin 12VHPWR standard is designed with no safety factor, causing melting cables.

title: How to Convert Texts into 3D Models

title: Nvidia's new WHQL driver squashes some game-crashing bugs, adds support for Avowed and Civ VII
content: Nvidia has released the GeForce Game Ready Driver 572.42 WHQL, which includes day-one support for Avowed and Civilization VII and Frame Generation updates for several other titles.
contentSnippet: Nvidia has released the GeForce Game Ready Driver 572.42 WHQL, which includes day-one support for Avowed and Civilization VII and Frame Generation updates for several other titles.

title: Official RTX 4090 power cable found melted by reviewer 2 years later — card  functioned fine despite hidden melted connector
content: The gaming/tech review site Dark Side of Gaming looked at its test rig RTX 4090 and 12VHPWR cable. Despite not removing the cable from the RTX 4090 over two years of use, the connector has become melted and exposed.
contentSnippet: The gaming/tech review site Dark Side of Gaming looked at its test rig RTX 4090 and 12VHPWR cable. Despite not removing the cable from the RTX 4090 over two years of use, the connector has become melted and exposed.

title: Nvidia confirms RTX 5070 Ti release date for February 20, starting at $749
content: Nvidia officially confirms the RTX 5070 Ti will be released on February 20th at 6 AM Pacific Time. The new GPU will be available from AIB partners and system integrators. No Founders Edition model will be provided.
contentSnippet: Nvidia officially confirms the RTX 5070 Ti will be released on February 20th at 6 AM Pacific Time. The new GPU will be available from AIB partners and system integrators. No Founders Edition model will be provided.

creator: ashilov@gmail.com (Anton Shilov)
title: US gov't pushing TSMC and Intel to create joint venture in the US: Report
author: ashilov@gmail.com (Anton Shilov)
content: TSMC has made no official announcements about expanding in the U.S. at the board meetings this week, but the rumor mill points to quicker expansion in Arizona and a joint venture with Intel.
contentSnippet: TSMC has made no official announcements about expanding in the U.S. at the board meetings this week, but the rumor mill points to quicker expansion in Arizona and a joint venture with Intel.

title: Maker creates Raspberry Pi-powered thermal fusion night vision goggles
content: Angus Logue is using a Raspberry Pi 4 to power his cool thermal fusion night vision goggles that seriously step up the night vision game.
contentSnippet: Angus Logue is using a Raspberry Pi 4 to power his cool thermal fusion night vision goggles that seriously step up the night vision game.

title: Increased Linux kernel timer frequency delivers big boost in AI workloads

title: RX 9070 XT leaked specs point to 4,096 shaders and 16GB VRAM — 3.1 GHz boost clocks and PCIe 5.0 support

contentSnippet: Specs of AMD's upcoming RX 9070 XT have allegedly been pictured in GPU-Z, revealing 4,096 shaders, 16GB of 20 Gbps memory, and PCIe 5.0 support.

title: AMD's beastly 'Strix Halo' Ryzen AI Max+ matches the RTX 4060 laptop in leaked 3DMark tests

title: Musk claims Grok 3 is 'outperforming' rivals, with full release imminent
content: Elon Musk said at the World Government Summit in Dubai that xAI's Grok 3 will arrive in two to three weeks and will be more powerful than any other LLM currently out there.

title: Cherry Xtrfy M68 Pro Wireless Mouse Review
content: The Cherry Xtrfy M68 Pro Wireless Mouse is a symmetrical, lightweight mouse designed for a no-fuss approach to mouse management. Built with an impressive battery life and solid 8,000Hz poll rate sensor, some interesting design decisions leave it in an odd place.
contentSnippet: The Cherry Xtrfy M68 Pro Wireless Mouse is a symmetrical, lightweight mouse designed for a no-fuss approach to mouse management. Built with an impressive battery life and solid 8,000Hz poll rate sensor, some interesting design decisions leave it in an odd place.
